text.page:
504
102-252b @#/ /'phags pa nag po chen po'i gzungs rims nad thams cad las thar bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nag po chen po skyes bu nag ser mche ba rnon po/ mche ba chen po rims nad thams cad las rnam par thar bar byed pa brjod par bya ste/ phyogs gang dang gang du bltas pa der bdag la rims nad med par gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ ha na ha na rA dzad+hU te na/ da ha da ha rA dzad+hU te na/ pa tsa pa tsa rA dza d+hU te na/ ba hu shra be/ ba hu pa ri pA ri/ ba hu pa ri sho d+ha ne i maM dzA ra tsaN+Da laM/ ha na ha na/ oM suM b+ha/ ni suM b+ha/ shi ra muny+tsa/ tsak+Shu muny+tsa/ shro tra muny+tsa/ g+h+rA Na muny+tsa/ dzi hwA muny+tsa/ ka Na Tha muny+tsa/ grI ba muny+tsa/ priSh+Tha muny+tsa/ kA Ti kA muny+tsa/ kuk+Sha muny+tsa/ U ru muny+tsa/ dza nau muny+tsa/ hasta muny+tsa/ pA dau muny+tsa/ aM gu li muny+tsa/ i ga pra t+yaM ga muny+tsa/ a ba sa ra/ a n+ya si maM gats+tsha/ dz+wa ra mu to si bdag la swA hA/ oM dz+wa la mA aM gu li hU~M/ sarba dz+wa rA na na phaT/ 'phags pa nag po chen po'i gzungs rims nad thams cad las rnam par thar bar byed pa rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
